branchCategory.name: AL-A
branchCategory.description: <P>SMC's newest AL modular style lubricator provides accurate lubrication of downstream equipment.  The AL bowl (size 30 and 40) is covered with a transparent bowl guard, allowing 360° monitoring. The oil drop rate is adjustable depending on equipment requirements. The AL modular design allows connection with other SMC air preparation equipment. </P>

branchItem.name: AL10-A to AL60-A, Lubricator, Metric North American & European
branchItem.description: <P>SMC's newest AL modular style lubricator provides accurate lubrication of downstream equipment.  The AL bowl (size 30 and 40) is covered with a transparent bowl guard, allowing 360° monitoring. The oil drop rate is adjustable depending on equipment requirements. The AL modular design allows connection with other SMC air preparation equipment. </P>
